snippet.title: Mech Mechanic Simulator Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the first gameplay trailer for Mech Mechanic Simulator! Deconstruct, rebuild, paint and fix gigantic iron machines. You are a Mech Mechanic, and you better get ready to get your hands dirty.

Mech Mechanic Simulator will be out in October 2020.

Add game to your Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1044980/Mech_Mechanic_Simulator/

Follow Mech Mechanic Simulator: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MechMechanicSimluator
WWW: http://polyslash.com/mechmechanicsimulator/
